curam.util.xml.intf
Interface XSLTemplateUtility

All Known Implementing Classes:
curam.util.xml.base.XSLTemplateUtility
Direct Known Subclasses:
XSLTemplateUtilityFactory
public abstract class XSLTemplateUtility
extends curam.util.xml.base.XSLTemplateUtility

Utility functions useful when selecting templates for printing documents.
